name: Short Fuse (itch) (Lee-Pic, Luther)
description:
A puzzle game where you clear a field of bombs using more bombs!

Controls :

Delete or backspace to delete a bomb.

R to restart the level.

Enter or space to start.

Click in the red zone to place a bomb.

Click and drag to move a bomb.

Clicking and dragging with the mouse off the selected bomb or holding shift gives more precision.

Scroll wheel or buttons to the right of bomb on selected bomb to change fuse timer.

Programming - Luther

Art - Leespic

Music - Noah Jamaldin  https://soundcloud.com/karamoja-972528574
